mapper.insert: insert into business (b_title, b_date, b_write, b_image , b_place, member_no, b_share) values (#{b_title}, SYSDATE(), #{b_write}, #{b_image},#{b_place},2,#{b_share})
mapper.select: select * from business b order by b_date desc limit 5,6
select count(*) from business where b_share = 1
select count(*) from business where b_share = 0
